name: com.rafasloth.archviz.core
description:
Package Required to make a catalog of environments compatible with the Archviz project.

It requires to download XR Interaction Toolkit's Starter Assets sample.

It needs to be a 3D (URP) Core template based Unity Project.

It requires all Addressable groups to be Remote:
http://192.168.0.254:8080/[BuildTarget] as load path for the Remote.LoadPath for the Default addressable profile. Include Addressable group in Build ON. Top Level settings -> Build Remote Catalog ON. See addressables Multi Project at https://docs.unity.cn/Packages/com.unity.addressables@1.18/manual/MultiProject.html
